        Parameters:
        mediaList - The media list object to follow

      • setMediaList

        public void setMediaList()
        Sets LibVLC to follow the default media list (see below)

      • getPrimaryMediaList

        public MediaList getPrimaryMediaList()
        Gets the primary media list, or the "currently playing" list. Not to be confused with the media list pointer from above, which refers the the MediaList object that libVLC is currently following. This list is just one out of many lists that it can be pointed towards. This list will be used for lists of songs that are not user-defined. For example: selecting a song from the Songs list, or from the list displayed after selecting an album. It is loaded as the default list.
        Returns:
        The primary media list

        Parameters:
        f - the surface to draw
